Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:246#3004#Arkant} at the {@Rgn:46017$$Shadowspark Chamber} in the Three Towers requested help.

The Three Towers represents our greatest chance to unlock the mysteries of the argons. We can't fail there.

Oh, thank Velik! Can we ever use a soldier's aid!

First, the {@LinkCreature:46#401#argonomorph ossugon warlords} are too close for comfort. Creepy undead argons? No thanks.

Second, the {@LinkCreature:46#403#argonomorph iskaragards} are interrupting our research efforts. We want them destroyed.

Third, we need the {@LinkCreature:246#3011#symbral amplifers} destroyed.

All are vital targets, but priorities shift. Stay flexible.

Your dedication to others is the finest example of federation values I can imagine.

Thanks for all your help, . We won't forget it.
